questions.question_text: The Product Owner's primary concern is the flow of value reflected in the ordering of the Product Backlog.
questions.answer_description: The Product Owner is also known as the value maximizer. He is responsible for maximizing the value of the work that the Development Team does. This is done through the ordering of the Product Backlog.

questions.question_text: During Sprint Planning, the Development Team was not able to confidently forecast a Sprint Backlog but the Scrum Team was able to create a Sprint Goal for upcoming Sprint. What action should the Scrum Master take?

choices.C: Forecast the most likely Product Backlog items to meet the goal and discuss in the upcoming Sprint Retrospective why this happened and what changes will make it less likely to recur.
choices.B: Extend the Sprint Planning time-box until the Development Team can forecast enough items to begin the Sprint.
choices.A: Postpone the Sprint in order for the Product Owner to refine the Product Backlog to the level needed.
choices.D: Request assistance from the technical architect.

questions.question_text: According to the values of Scrum, which is the best way to create Development Teams?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C is correct

choices.C: Provide boundaries to the developers and allow them to self-organize into Development Teams.
choices.B: Work with the leadership team to allocate members according to skills, seniority and experience to ensure that all Development Teams are balanced fairly.
choices.A: The Product Owner will create a skills matrix according to what is needed for the project and work with the technical leads to allocate resources to the team.

questions.answer_description: When the values of commitment, courage, focus, openness and respect are embodied and lived by the Scrum Team, the Scrum pillars of transparency, inspection, and adaptation come to life and build trust for everyone and self- organizing teams will be enabled to choose how best to accomplish their work.
A good first question for you to suggest the group thinking about when forming into teams is ג€How will we make sure all teams have the right amount of expertise?ג€

choices.C: Ask the developers to divide themselves into teams.
choices.B: Have the resource manager assign the people to teams.
choices.A: Create teams based on their functional layer.

questions.question_text: How should a Scrum Master divide a group of 100 people into multiple Development Teams?

You are the Scrum Master for four Scrum Teams working on one product. Several of the developers notify you that their teams will need full-time help of an external technical specialist in the upcoming two Sprints.
What key concerns should the Scrum Master take into account?

choices.D: Hiring additional resources to fill the void in skillset.
choices.B: The benefit of Development Teams solving the problem themselves and the ability to produce integrated Increments.
choices.A: Having enough work for all Development Team members.
